content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Keizo Nakamura, your new neighbor, about recycling garbage. Press record to begin each response to the conversation. Response 1

You will have a conversation with Keizo Nakamura, your new neighbor, about recycling garbage. Press record to begin each response to the conversation. Response 1

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life
